verses.name: 1 Kings 2:20
verses.text: Then she said, I desire one small petition of thee; I pray thee, say me not nay. And the king said unto her, Ask on, my mother: for I will not say thee nay.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:21
verses.text: And she said, Let Abishag the Shunammite be given to Adonijah thy brother to wife.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:22
verses.text: And king Solomon answered and said unto his mother, And why dost thou ask Abishag the Shunammite for Adonijah? ask for him the kingdom also; for he is mine elder brother; even for him, and for Abiathar the priest, and for Joab the son of Zeruiah.
